newsitem.title: USA: Total World Telecommunications Q2 results.
newsitem.headline: Total World Telecommunications Q2 results.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE: Total World Telecommunications Inc said its net loss for the second quarter of 1997 included several one-time charge-offs for the divestitures of the company's real estate and auditing divisions and an estimated $6 million for the discontinuance of the non-telecom operations and an additional $464,974 of operating loss from those discontinued non-telecom operations.

The company was not available to discuss the second quarter of 1997 charge-offs, its earnings per share for either second quarter, its net income for the second quarter of 1996 or the results for its first six months to date in either period.
